document_data.name: Magnol
document_data.mainbody: '''Magnol''' was a [[firesoul genasi]] and the Steward of Fire of the [[Four Stewards]] of [[Akanûl]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Magnol was a powerfully built genasi.
document_data.Personality: Magnol was considered as a courageous person and he had the well-being and prosperity of Akanûl as one of his priorities.
document_data.Activities: As the Steward of Fire, Magnol was the general and second-in-command of the military forces of Akanûl.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Magnol was sent by Queen [[Arathane]] to [[Chessenta]] with a contingent of the Akanûlan army, in order to help [[Tchazzar]] in his war against [[Tymanther]].
